A

add(Item) - Method in class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.Bag
Adds the item to this bag.
adj(int) - Method in class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.Graph
Returns the vertices adjacent to vertex v.
App - Class in pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert
The App class implements the solution to the Phoenician problem, using resources implemented in the other classes in this folder, such as a graph datastructure (implemented by the Graph class) and the breadth-first algorithm (implemented by the BreadthFirstSearch class).
App() - Constructor for class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.App
 

B

Bag<Item> - Class in pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert
The Bag class represents a bag (or multiset) of generic items.
Bag() - Constructor for class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.Bag
Initializes an empty bag.
BreadthFirstSearch - Class in pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert
The BreadthFirstSearch class implements the breadth-first search algorithm, which always returns the shortest path (i.e., the path that visits as few vertices as possible) between two vertices in a Graph instance.
BreadthFirstSearch(Graph, int) - Constructor for class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.BreadthFirstSearch
Constructs an object that carries out the breadth-first algorithm for a certain reference vertex in a given graph.

D

distanceTo(int) - Method in class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.BreadthFirstSearch
Tells how many vertices apart a given vertex is from the reference vertex of this BreadthFirstSearch instance.

G

getPortsCount() - Method in class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.Graph
Tells how many ports there are in the map.
getVertexCount() - Method in class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.Graph
Returns the number of vertices in this graph.
Graph - Class in pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert
The Graph class is the implementation of a graph for the Phoenician problem, based off of Robert Sedgewick's and Kevin Wayne's implementation for a graph of integer vertices, which uses an array of Bag elements to store the vertices of the graph and the adjacency list of each one of them.
Graph(String) - Constructor for class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.Graph
Constructs an empty graph based on a certain input file, which must conform with the specification for input files for this program.

H

hasPathTo(int) - Method in class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.BreadthFirstSearch
Tells whether or not a given vertex has a path to the reference vertex of this BreadthFirstSearch instance.

I

isEmpty() - Method in class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.Bag

iterator() - Method in class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.Bag

R

returnToFirstPort(Graph) - Static method in class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.App
Tells the distance from the last port in the map directly to the first port in the map, without making any stops.

translatePortToCode(int) - Method in class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.Graph
Translates a given port number to its respective code in the graph datastructure.
translateVertexCode(int) - Method in class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.Graph

travelToLastPort(Graph) - Static method in class pucrs.alest2.assignment2.rsuffert.App
Tells the distance from the first port in the map to the last port in the map, visiting all ports that are accessible in order.
